body_html: I am not sure this is acceptable behavior : we are lucky that the CRC check failed, otherwise you will be silently training with corrupted data which is kind of scary. Some may say this is a kind data augmentation? ;-)
body_text: I am not sure this is acceptable behavior : we are lucky that the CRC check failed, otherwise you will be silently training with corrupted data which is kind of scary. Some may say this is a kind data augmentation? ;-)
body: I am not sure this is acceptable behavior : we are lucky that the CRC check failed, otherwise you will be silently training with corrupted data which is kind of scary. Some may say this is a kind data augmentation? ;-)
